battletag.label: Battletag
battletag.tooltip: The list of the battletag used to retrieve the Overwatch competitive rank.

region.label: Region
region.tooltip: The region where the account plays the competitive games.

message.label: Messsage
message.tooltip: The message show before the competitive rank information.

cooldown.label: Cooldown
cooldown.tooltip: The interval between two consecutive execution of the command.

show.label: Show rank
show.tooltip: Send the rank information on the twitch chat.
